Lyric:
[by:cesium14]
[00:03.88]Blind devotion, empty notions
[00:11.61]Like a roaring ocean, slowing motion

[00:22.95]Lay down your troubled mind
[00:27.98]We are only kind
[00:31.14]And we'll kindly cease to be
[00:35.89]As we intertwine with the universe
[00:42.05]And its cosmic symphony

[01:04.42]Smoke lingers after fire

[01:26.71]Smoke lingers after fire

[01:51.56]Blind devotion, empty notions
[02:01.84]Like a roaring ocean, slowing motion
[02:11.40]Smoke lingers after fire

[02:57.65]Lay down your troubled mind
[03:02.25]We are only kind
[03:06.34]And we'll kindly cease to be
[03:10.59]As we intertwine with the universe
[03:16.43]And its cosmic symphony

[03:38.86]'Cause smoke lingers after fire
[04:01.04]'Cause smoke lingers after fire
